item.title: Tencent profit surges 90% as it touts AI revenue boost and ramps up spending
item.description: Tencent on Wednesday posted a fourth-quarter beat on top and bottom line driven by a surge in gaming and advertising revenue.

item.title: Shares of DocuSign surge 14% on strong earnings, AI boost
item.description: CEO Allan Thygesen said the company has "started to turn the corner on the core business."

item.title: Chinese battery giant CATL posts annual revenue drop ahead of Hong Kong listing
item.description: The world's largest electric-vehicle battery maker has filed for a listing in Hong Kong, without disclosing the exact size and timeline.

item.title: BMW posts 37% drop in annual net profit, warns of 'subdued' Chinese demand
item.description: BMW's net profits slumped by more than a third in 2024 as weaker demand in China and Germany weighed on the high-end car manufacturer.

item.title: Ulta issues weak guidance, citing consumer uncertainty, rising competition and company missteps
item.description: Ulta Beauty warned that profits and revenue will be worse than Wall Street expected in the year ahead.
